headline: Southern Company announces equity units offering
summary: Southern Company (NYSE: SO) today announced it plans to sell 35 million equity units in a public offering. Each equity unit will be issued in a stated amount of $50 ($1.75 billion aggregate stated amount) and will consist of a contract to purchase Southern Company common stock in the future and two 1/40 undivided beneficial ownership interests in remarketable senior notes each having a principal amount of $1,000.
